name: OOCSS
desc: OOCSS concepts help us write components that are flexible, modular and interchangeable.

name: Atomic CSS
desc: Atomic CSS is the approach to CSS architecture that favors small, single-purpose classes with names based on visual function.

name: BEM
desc: Block Element Modifier is a methodology that helps you to create reusable components and code sharing in front-end development.

name: SMACSS
desc: SMACSS is a way to examine your design process and as a way to fit those rigid frameworks into a flexible thought process.
